text: krome tekh, kotoryye svyazany s narodom, mezhdu kotorym i vami yest' soyuz; ili oni prishli k vam, a grudi ikh stesneny, chtoby srazhat'sya s vami ili srazhat'sya s ikh narodom. A yesli by Allakh khotel, On dal by im vlast' nad vami, i oni by srazhalis' s vami. A yesli oni otoydut ot vas, ne srazhayas' s vami, i predlozhat vam mir, to Allakh ne dayet vam nikakogo puti protiv nikh
